en.title: Cat Hydration Guide: Recommended Daily Water Intake and Tips
en.content:
Cats are descended from desert-dwelling ancestors, so they tend not to drink much water. However, adequate hydration is essential for maintaining kidney health.

Recommended Daily Water Intake

The guideline is approximately 40-60 ml per kilogram of body weight per day. For a 4 kg cat, that is about 160-240 ml. This includes water content from wet food.

Tips to Encourage Drinking

Place water bowls in multiple locations. For cats that prefer flowing water, use an automatic water fountain. Some cats may find lukewarm water easier to drink. Supplementing with wet food is also an effective strategy.

Signs of Dehydration

If you gently pinch the skin on the back of the neck and it does not spring back immediately, dehydration may be present. Dry gums and sunken eyes are also warning signs to watch for.

zh.title: 猫咪补水指南：每日饮水量参考与实用技巧
zh.content:
猫咪的祖先来自沙漠地区，因此天生不太爱喝水。但充足的水分摄入对维护肾脏健康至关重要。

每日饮水量参考

标准为每公斤体重每天约40~60毫升。4公斤的猫约为160~240毫升。这包括湿粮中所含的水分。

促进饮水的技巧

在多个位置放置水碗。喜欢流动水的猫咪可以使用自动饮水器（水泉）。将水加温至微温有时也能增加饮水量。搭配喂食湿粮也是有效的方法。

脱水的信号

轻轻捏起颈后的皮肤松开后，如果不能立即恢复原状，可能存在脱水。牙龈干燥、眼窝凹陷也是需要注意的警告信号。
